PrecisEnactment of the STORAGE, DISPLAY AND TRANSPORTATION OF FIREARMS AND OTHER WEAPONS BY BUSINESSES REGULATIONS which prescribe the manner in which BUSINESSES shall store, transport or display non-restricted, restricted and prohibited handguns, firearms, weapons, devices, ammunition and their components and parts.
